homepage.title: A un passo dal Lago
homepage.poetic_sentence: Beauty and calm are the true companions of a restful mind.
homepage.author: Anonymous

soggiorno.title: Living Room
soggiorno.description: A spacious and cozy living room with comfortable seating, a flat-screen TV, and large windows that let in natural light. The perfect place to relax after a day of exploring the local attractions.

cucina.title: Fully Equipped Kitchen
cucina.description: Our modern kitchen is fully equipped with all the necessary appliances, including a fridge, oven, microwave, and dishwasher, to make you feel at home during your stay.

camera.title: Master Bedroom
camera.description: The master bedroom offers a king-sized bed with premium linens and a serene atmosphere for a restful nightâ€™s sleep. Wake up to beautiful views of the surrounding nature.

bagno.title: Luxury Bathroom
bagno.description: The apartment features a spacious, modern bathroom complete with a walk-in shower, high-quality toiletries, and fluffy towels for your convenience.

balcone.title: Private Balcony
balcone.description: Enjoy your morning coffee or a glass of wine in the evening on our private balcony, offering stunning views of the local surroundings and a peaceful escape.
